tech.desc: I am most comfortable with Visual Studio and the C# language, but am willing to learn new technologies. I am also familiar with the attitudes of Agile methodologies, specifically Scrum and Kanban, and several design patterns. Additionally, I am familiar with the basics of writing unit and integration tests.

start_desc.second: My name is Dominik and I am the creator of this website!

end_desc.first: I am a 3rd year student of computer science at SGGW in Warsaw. During my studies, I created several of my own projects and gained experience as an ERP system implementer. This website was created using Node and React in JavaScript.

inputs.email_info: We'll never share your email with anyone else.

first.11: , as well as several design patterns. Additionally, I am familiar with the basics of writing unit and integration tests.

paragraf.second: I'm interested in grapling and the culture of East Asian countries. In my free time I most enjoy training BJJ, reading books and listening to podcasts.

project1.desc: A custom online store project created for educational purposes. The online store has basic functionality such as ad display and shopping cart. In addition, integration tests are written for each new functionality. During the development of the site, Blazor WebAssembly was used on the front end, ASP Web Api as the server and EF Core for the database connection.

project2.desc: My first team project involving about 20 people, divided into two teams: developers and testers. The project allows playing solitaire online with other users. It was created using Node.JS and React.JS. In this project, I was responsible for the user account and some animations.

project3.desc: An idea for an advanced project that I would like to implement in the near future. It will be a web application aggregating promotional newspapers of grocery stores such as Biedronka and Auchan, among others. I will be doing this project as part of my engineering work.

project4.desc: The project was to create a personal portfolio. The application was created using Node.js - Express and React, is in progress and will be modified on an ongoing basis.

small_projects.1: A mobile application for raising bee queens in Xamarin and SQL Lite (team project).
small_projects.2: An OLX-like web application (basic functions), developed using Blazor WebAssembly, ASP Web Api and EF Core (team project).
